article.title: Insight Wins $617 Million Contract for Microsoft Licenses
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Insight Public Sector, Chantilly, Va., was awarded a $617,251,927 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of Microsoft Enterprise License Agreements for 1.5 million devices. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Alexandria, Va., is the contracting activity.
